metatag.name: Component
metatag.description: Used to define object definitions on a class which will be used by the class scaning system in Spring Actionscript

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: object name as it will be known in the application context

attribute.name: scope
attribute.description: determines if the object will be a singleton or not

attribute.name: lazyInit
attribute.description: determines if the object will be created at context startup when its defined as a singleton

attribute.name: factoryMethod
attribute.description: The name of a method which should be invoked instead of using new ClassName()

attribute.name: factoryObjectName
attribute.description: The name of an object definition known by the context which will be used as a factory for the current object definition, when this is set the factoryMethod is required to be set also

attribute.name: initMethod
attribute.description: The name of a method which will be invoked directly after the object has been created

attribute.name: destroyMethod
attribute.description: The name of a method on the class defined by the className property that will be called when the application context is disposed. Destroy methods are used to release resources that are being kept by an object.

attribute.name: autowire
attribute.description: Defines the way an object will be autowired (configured).

attribute.name: primary
attribute.description: True if this object needs to be used as the primary autowire candidate when the container is autowiring by type.

attribute.name: dependsOn
attribute.description: A comma delimited list of object names that this object depends on.

attribute.name: skipPostProcessors
attribute.description: Determines whether the object factory will send the created object through its list of IObjectProcessors.

attribute.name: skipMetadata
attribute.description: Determines whether the autowire processor will examine the class metadata.

attribute.name: dependencyCheck
attribute.description: Determines if and how the object properties dependencies should be checked.

metatag.name: Constructor
metatag.description: Used to define constructor arguments that need to be injected by Spring Actionscript

attribute.name: args
attribute.description: comma delimited number of constructor arguments that can be defined like this: value=Value,ref=objectName

metatag.name: Inject
metatag.description: Used to define values or object that need to be injected by Spring Actionscript

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: explicit value to be injected, or a placeholder like this ${plaveHolderName}

attribute.name: ref
attribute.description: the id of another component that needs to be be injected

metatag.name: Invoke
metatag.description: Used to define argument values or references that need to be injected by Spring Actionscript

attribute.name: args
attribute.description: comma delimited number of arguments that can be defined like this: value=Value,ref=objectName

metatag.name: EventHandler
metatag.description: Adds the annotated method as an event listener to the IEventBus instance of the current application context

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Determines the event type that the annotated method handles

attribute.name: properties
attribute.description: Determines the event properties that will be passed to the annotated method

attribute.name: clazz
attribute.description: Determines the event Class that the annotated method will handle

attribute.name: useWeakReference
attribute.description: Determines if the event handler will be added using a weak reference

attribute.name: topics
attribute.description: A comma separated list of topics that the event handler will listen for.

metatag.name: RouteEvents
metatag.description: Re-routes the events dispatched by an object to the EventBus

attribute.name: events
attribute.description: A list of event types that need to be re-routed

attribute.name: topics
attribute.description: A comma separated list of topics that the event will be associated with.

metatag.name: RouteMVCEvents
metatag.description: Re-routes the events dispatched by an object to the EventBus for use by the MVC micro-framework

attribute.name: events
attribute.description: A list of event types that need to be re-routed

attribute.name: topics
attribute.description: A comma separated list of topics that the event will be associated with.

metatag.name: Command
metatag.description: Indicates that the decorated class is a command that is triggered by an Event

attribute.name: eventType
attribute.description: An event type that triggers the current Command

attribute.name: eventClass
attribute.description: An event Class that will trigger the current Command

attribute.name: executeMethod
attribute.description: The method on the Command that will be invoked after instantiation and injection of the Command

attribute.name: properties
attribute.description: A list of property names on the Event that will be injected into the Command, either as arguments for its execute method or as properties

attribute.name: priority
attribute.description: The priority of the current command when more than one command is triggered by an event, higher == first

attribute.name: topics
attribute.description: A comma separated list of topics that the command will be triggered for.

metatag.name: Autowired
metatag.description: Determines if the annotated properties will be automatically injected by Spring Actionscript

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: Determines the autowiring mode, available options are: byName, byType, constructor, autodetect

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Determines the name of the object known by Spring Actionscript that will be injected

attribute.name: property
attribute.description: Used in combination with the 'name' attribute, determines a property name on the specified object to which the annotated property will be bound

attribute.name: externalProperty
attribute.description: The name of an external property that will be injected

metatag.name: Required
metatag.description: Properties annotated with the [Required] metadata MUST be injected, if Spring Actionscript fails to inject a valid value an error will be thrown
